query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM_GROUP WHERE ITEM_GROUP_ID = ?

query.name: findGroupByOid
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM_GROUP WHERE OC_OID = ?

query.name: findGroupByOidAndCrfId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM_GROUP WHERE OC_OID = ? and crf_id=?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM_GROUP

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO ITEM_GROUP (ITEM_GROUP_ID,name,crf_id,status_id, date_created ,owner_id) VALUES (?,?,?,?,now(),?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ITEM_GROUP SET name=?,crf_id =?, status_id=?, date_updated =now(),update_id=? WHERE ITEM_GROUP_ID=?

query.name: findByName
query.sql: select * from item_group where name=?

query.name: findGroupsByItemID
query.sql: select fg.* from item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgm, item it where it.item_id = ? and it.item_id=fgm.item_id and fgm.item_group_id = fg.item_group_id

query.name: findGroupByCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id=? and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id

query.name: findGroupByGroupNameCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and igm.crf_version_id=? and ig.name=?

query.name: findGroupByItemIdCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and igm.crf_version_id=? and igm.item_id=?

query.name: findGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id

query.name: findGroupByLayoutId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, form_layout fl ,versioning_map vm where fl.form_layout_id=? and vm.form_layout_id=fl.form_layout_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and igm.item_id = vm.item_id

query.name: findLegitGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped' and igm.repeating_group = true

query.name: findLegitGroupAllBySectionId
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id

query.name: findOnlyGroupsByCRFVersionID
query.sql: select distinct ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id=? and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped'

query.name: findCurrentPKValue
query.sql: select currval('item_group_item_group_id_seq') as key

query.name: getNextPK
query.sql: select nextval('item_group_item_group_id_seq') as key

query.name: deleteTestGroup
query.sql: delete from item_group where name=?

query.name: isItemGroupRepeatingBasedOnAllCrfVersions
query.sql: select count(igm.item_group_metadata_id) from item_group ig,item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id AND oc_oid=? and (repeat_number > 1 or repeat_max > 1)

query.name: isItemGroupRepeatingBasedOnCrfVersion
query.sql: select count(igm.item_group_metadata_id) from item_group ig,item_group_metadata igm where ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id AND oc_oid=? and crf_version_id = ? and (repeat_number > 1 or repeat_max > 1)

query.name: findTopOneGroupBySectionId
query.sql: select ig.* from item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, section s, item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id=? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = ifm.section_id and ifm.item_id = igm.item_id and ig.name != 'Ungrouped' and igm.repeating_group = true limit 1
